name: The Man In the Black Suit
name_original: The Man In the Black Suit
description:
People are going missing left and right. You play as Rhodes, a bartender struggling to pay off debts to the mob. One day, during your shift, you discover a bag containing a body! And it seemingly belongs to the new mortician in town,  a man in a black suit known as Nathaniel Blake. Realizing that Nathaniel probably works for the mob and is the one causing people to disappear, you have the choice to either blackmail Nathaniel into giving you money or ignore the body and be incriminated yourself.

Will you join up with the mortician and explore the criminal underworld and evade the police? Or will you stay quiet in hopes it'll all be over soon?

The Man In The Black Suit is a narrative-driven thriller visual novel developed in 2021 in the Renpy Engine. The game includes a story dependent on the choices you make.

This game is rated M for violence, light gore descriptions, suggestive content, and harsh language

Content Warnings: discussions of physical abuse, gore, gun violence, poverty, alcoholism, discussions of police brutality/misconduct. If you feel uncomfortable with these things, discretion is advised.

This game is in early access in terms of sound and visuals. Backgrounds are open source. Art and Writing by megnacarta.
